name: Paul Johnston - trying to be civil (as a service)

content.html: As someone who has been doing serverless for nearly 8 years, and worked for AWS on serverless, and currently supporting a large org to deliver a very big serverless solution... ... trying to build/waiting for the abstraction means you don't understand serverless.
content.value:
As someone who has been doing serverless for nearly 8 years, and worked for AWS on serverless, and currently supporting a large org to deliver a very big serverless solution...

... trying to build/waiting for the abstraction means you don't understand serverless.
